xQlnqTMC9xA.title: Open-Source AI Agent Can Build FULL STACK Apps (FREE ‚ÄúDevin‚Äù Alternative)
xQlnqTMC9xA.author: Matthew Berman
xQlnqTMC9xA.description:
GPTPilot (now Pythagora) has been upgraded since my last video and is now much more capable. It can now build entire full-stack applications. Not only that, but you can now add features to existing projects! 

Install VS Code Plugin: https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=PythagoraTechnologies.gpt-pilot-vs-code
Download GPTPilot now: https://github.com/Pythagora-io/gpt-pilot

Join My Newsletter for Regular AI Updates üëáüèº
https://www.matthewberman.com

Need AI Consulting? ‚úÖ 
https://forwardfuture.ai/

USE CODE "MatthewBerman" for 50% discount
